title: Mature ale

properties.name: description
properties.value: Mature ales are members-only, stronger versions of regular ale. They provide stronger skill boosts, larger deboosts, and heal more than the regular versions. These are only obtainable through brewing, where there is a chance that a batch of ale matures during the brewing process. Leaving an ale in the fermenting vat after it has fully set will not turn it mature. The chance of brewing a mature ale increases from 5% to 36% by adding the stuff to the vat after adding in barley malt.[1] The stuff cannot be used to make mature cider, the player must rely on the 5% chance. It is purchasable from Honest Jimmy for 50 pieces of eight, a reward from the Trouble Brewing minigame.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Mature

Mature ales are members-only, stronger versions of regular ale. They provide stronger skill boosts, larger deboosts, and heal more than the regular versions. These are only obtainable through brewing, where there is a chance that a batch of ale matures during the brewing process. Leaving an ale in the fermenting vat after it has fully set will not turn it mature. The chance of brewing a mature ale increases from 5% to 36% by adding the stuff to the vat after adding in barley malt.[1] The stuff cannot be used to make mature cider, the player must rely on the 5% chance. It is purchasable from Honest Jimmy for 50 pieces of eight, a reward from the Trouble Brewing minigame.

  1. ↑ Testing has shown it is not 64% as Mod Ash was previously cited and likely closer to 36%. Please comment on Talk:Brewing with questions, comments, or if you want to contribute data.
